name: Annihilation of Enemies
description: Annihilates enemies and zooms out to view the entire area.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers or activates this actor to annihilate enemies.

fields.name: Effect
fields.description: Determines what happens to the enemies upon annihilation.

7.name: Transform into Force Crystals
7.description: Defeated enemies are transformed into force crystals.
